about_the_game:
11 legendary officers will be added.

▼Additional Officers
Lian Po / Lin Xiangru / Zhao Yong / Li Mu / Han Fei / Bai Qi / Xiang Yan / Tian Wen / Xiong Yi / Huang Xie / Wei Wuji

▼To Use
Select a scenario in the "MAIN MODE" using "SELECT SCENARIO." Under "MANAGE ORIGINAL OFFICERS" select legendary officers from "ALLOW ORIGINAL OFFICERS TO APPEAR."
Following this, you will be able to use this character in the MAIN MODE.
detailed_description:
11 legendary officers will be added.

▼Additional Officers
Lian Po / Lin Xiangru / Zhao Yong / Li Mu / Han Fei / Bai Qi / Xiang Yan / Tian Wen / Xiong Yi / Huang Xie / Wei Wuji

▼To Use
Select a scenario in the "MAIN MODE" using "SELECT SCENARIO." Under "MANAGE ORIGINAL OFFICERS" select legendary officers from "ALLOW ORIGINAL OFFICERS TO APPEAR."
Following this, you will be able to use this character in the MAIN MODE.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
